name: Ext_R3_StructureDefinition_contextType
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.StructureDefinition.contextType for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents StructureDefinition.contextType from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: If this is an extension, Identifies the context within FHIR resources where the extension can be used.
element.comment: `StructureDefinition.contextType` maps to R4 `StructureDefinition.context.expression`. `expression` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/extension-context`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: If this is an extension, Identifies the context within FHIR resources where the extension can be used.
element.comment: `StructureDefinition.contextType` maps to R4 `StructureDefinition.context.expression`. `expression` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/extension-context`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: How an extension context is interpreted.
